name: 55s Clean Bros
description:
This game about to bros, that work in cleaning company, and they need to clean a house for 55 sec. Good luck!

If u found a bug, that makes impossible to play the game, just restart it.

How to start a game:

1. Download ZIP.

2. Unarchivate ZIP.

3. Take a folder with version of your OS.

4. Open nw.exe.

5. Play!
